data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kharkiv, Ukraine.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kharkiv, Ukraine
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Kharkiv.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 27 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 101,791 believers in Kharkiv to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: There are 2,808,700 people living in the state of Kharkiv. Only about 101,791 might be believers.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Tatar, Judeo-Crimean people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
God, we pray for the believers in Kharkiv, Ukraine that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Father, help the 101,791 believers in Kharkiv to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kharkiv, Ukraine has a population of 2,808,700.

We estimate Kharkiv has 101,791 people who might know Jesus, 1,941,407 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 765,502 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 27 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Kharkiv, Ukraine, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

location.name: Kharkiv
